meanings.definition: The position or function of a delegate.
meanings.sent1: In the meeting, the delegacy of the representative was to present the proposal.
meanings.sent2: The delegacy of the ambassador involves attending important international conferences.
meanings.sent3: The delegacy of the team captain was to bring snacks for everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her delegacy as the class president made her responsible for organizing school events.
meanings.sent5: The delegacy of the CEO includes making crucial decisions for the company.

meanings.definition: The group of delegates representing a particular organization or body.
meanings.sent1: The delegacy from our school won first place in the debate competition.
meanings.sent2: The delegacy at the conference included members from various countries.
meanings.sent3: The delegacy of animals at the zoo had a meeting to discuss feeding schedules.
meanings.sent4: The delegacy of superheroes gathered to plan their next mission.
meanings.sent5: The delegacy of chefs prepared a delicious feast for the event.
